item.title: A Syllabus of Conservative Thought
item.description: My crash course, in seven units.

item.title: The Trump Administration Should Articulate and Defend Its Tariff Game Plan
item.description: The team has approached its most distinctive economic policy in a way that maximizes its ability to negotiate, but not its ability to play defense.

item.title: Nostalgia, the Not-So-Great Pastime
item.description: Eephus mourns America’s last baseball game.

item.title: Beijing Weaponizes Strategic Ambiguity on Taiwan
item.description: China’s latest action looks less like an exercise and more like a deliberate attempt to erase the line between drills and war.

item.title: Thierry Breton’s Vacation Problem
item.description: The week of December 22, 2025: Confronting the EU’s online censorship, the Fed, Elon Musk’s pay, and more.
